definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom)/fig. to offer sb a humble apology
to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
